Keywords: Arakko , Assassin , Past , Warrior

Special Powers
(+5 POINTS) SWORD BEARER: This character starts the game with any Sword equipment equipped.
ADAMANTIUM SKIN: Invincible. When Solem uses it to reduce damage from an equipped opposing character's attack, he reduces the damage by 3 instead. Protected: Outwit.

Novashotgunner
This is legit one of my favorite figures in the entire set. He has great sustainability just rush him into the fight and lock an attacker down. The sword trait is icing. I got 2 in a battle Royale and they were so tough for anyone to take down. Iâ€™d seriously recommend build with him.
September 17, 2022
tidge
If there remains any semblance of a point formula; comparing this OP kit figure to the Retail version can give us some hints about the "math" (spoilers, it looks like its just "clix of life", maybe there is some consideration for raw stats). Setting that aside, I greatly prefer this version to the other available options. This dial offers pretty much all the stand reasons to equip an object that grants B/CF: Charge+Exploit Weakness, ending with Flurry+Close Combat Expert, with damage values that make B/C/F a solid option. The real kicker is the top-dial Invincible that cannot be outwitted. The Sword Bearer trait should always be used. Any of the "defensive" sword options would serve Solem fine, as the B/C/F is at least as important as any secondary effect. Personally, I want offense from a character like this, so my initial instinct is to assigned OP kit Pogg Ur-Pogg to grant Giant Reach 3.
